net.jadler.stubbing

Interface RequestStubbing

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Stubbing

    public interface RequestStubbing
    This interface defines methods for the http stubbing WHEN part. These methods provides a way to define predicates (in form of Hamcrest matchers) the incoming http request must fulfill in order to return a stub response (defined by methods of ResponseStubbing).

      Finishes the WHEN part of this stubbing and starts the THEN part.
      RequestStubbing that(org.hamcrest.Matcher<? super javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest> predicate)
      Adds a request predicate to define the WHEN part of this stubbing.

    • Method Detail

      • that

        RequestStubbing that(org.hamcrest.Matcher<? super javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest> predicate)
        Adds a request predicate to define the WHEN part of this stubbing.
        Parameters:
        predicate - request predicate to be added to the WHEN part of this stubbing
        Returns:
        this ongoing stubbing

      • havingMethodEqualTo

        RequestStubbing havingMethodEqualTo(String method)
        Adds a request method predicate. The request method must be equal (case insensitive) to the given value.
        Parameters:
        method - expected http method of the incoming http request
        Returns:
        this ongoing stubbing

      • havingParameterEqualTo

        RequestStubbing havingParameterEqualTo(String name,
                                     String value)
        Adds a request parameter predicate. The given http parameter must be present in the request body and at least one of its values must be equal to the given value.
        Parameters:
        name - parameter name
        value - expected parameter value
        Returns:
        this ongoing stubbing

      • havingParameter

        RequestStubbing havingParameter(String name)
        Adds a request parameter existence predicate. The given http parameter must be present in the request body
        Parameters:
        name - parameter name
        Returns:
        this ongoing stubbing

      • havingParameters

        RequestStubbing havingParameters(String... names)
        Adds a request parameters existence predicate. All of the given http parameters must be present in the request body.
        Parameters:
        names - parameter names
        Returns:
        this ongoing stubbing

        RequestStubbing havingHeaders(String... names)

        Parameters:
        names - headers names
        Returns:
        this ongoing stubbing

      • respond

        ResponseStubbing respond()
        Finishes the WHEN part of this stubbing and starts the THEN part.
        Returns:
        response stubbing instance to continue this stubbing
